mapper.update:
update ums_member_signin_log
id = #{row.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_id = #{row.memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_username = #{row.memberUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signin_date = #{row.signinDate,jdbcType=DATE},
signin_time = #{row.signinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
points_earned = #{row.pointsEarned,jdbcType=INTEGER},
continuous_days = #{row.continuousDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cycle_signin_days = #{row.cycleSigninDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_reward_claimed = #{row.isRewardClaimed,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reward_coupon_id = #{row.rewardCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
signin_month = #{row.signinMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_ip = #{row.clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ums_member_signin_log set id = #{row.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_id = #{row.memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_username = #{row.memberUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signin_date = #{row.signinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, signin_time = #{row.signinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points_earned = #{row.pointsEarned,jdbcType=INTEGER}, continuous_days = #{row.continuousDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cycle_signin_days = #{row.cycleSigninDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_reward_claimed = #{row.isRewardClaimed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reward_coupon_id = #{row.rewardCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, signin_month = #{row.signinMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_ip = #{row.clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ums_member_signin_log
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_username = #{memberUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signin_date = #{signinDate,jdbcType=DATE},
signin_time = #{signinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
points_earned = #{pointsEarned,jdbcType=INTEGER},
continuous_days = #{continuousDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cycle_signin_days = #{cycleSigninDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_reward_claimed = #{isRewardClaimed,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reward_coupon_id = #{rewardCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
signin_month = #{signinMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_ip = #{clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
